attributes.review: so i was walking to the cheeto store cause i wanted to get cheeto juice. i decided to open this app and see what’s up with trump 2020 cause i’m a republican. i saw a liberal penguin and i was like haha ur dumb. then it bit me. now i have rabies and it’s all because of trump 😭✨ kanye 2020✨fr though don’t vote kanye bc it’ll go towards trump sooo. #SETTLEFORBIDEN2020 😤😤 𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣 the🥴name🙈game🥵JUDY👾judy🌶judy💞bo🩲budy🥳boanna🥰fanna💋fo🎂fudy🌈fe🌂
attributes.title: this app gave me rabies🤬🤬

attributes.review: This app works horrible!! It’s extremely slow and somehow messed up my phone and made it run slower.. terrible programming to whomever created this app your mother definitely isn’t proud of that’s for sure could’ve done better and by better meaning it should’ve never been made, thank you:)
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I’ve read a bunch of reviews and they all say that this app is very glitchy and will steal things like your fridge!? I cant believe the audacity of the creators of the app to even release this! This app causes multiple casualties on my device. I suggest that you get rid of this app entirely to save the other people time and storage on their phone!! Goodness gracious😠
attributes.title: THIS APP ISNT GOOD AT ALL

attributes.review: I just got this app and at first it was just glitching but then it started to make my phone literally shock me!!!! I’m in the hospital now because if this terrible app please don’t download it you will regret it:((( it also shocked my cat but I didn’t like her anyway because she would attack me all the time but still.
attributes.title: Don’t get this app

attributes.review: When I open up the app, all it shows is a picture of a rotting tangerine and asks me to put it my email address, I don’t know if this is some sort of bug or glitch, but it makes the app really hard to use. I’m deleting the app until whichever moron who’s in charge fixes it.
attributes.title: Doesn’t even work

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep track of my favorite umpa lumpa when the second I opened it my phone was hacked and filled with a bunch of viruses especially corona and I felt utterly terrible when I open the app and a man in black came down from my roof and took a picture of me!!!! Basically don’t ever download the app
attributes.title: Don’t not ever download!!!!!

attributes.review: My life was great before downloading this app. After downloading, my cat went mad and then all of the mirrors in my house broke after my burger lit on fire and then Kanye ran for president. I can’t even walk my penguin anymore because it got deported back to Antarctica. Do not download this app until you want your life completely and utterly destroyed.
attributes.title: Ruined my life

attributes.review: They are just trying to get your information don’t let them take our freedom. Thought our majestic president would be different but the first thing they ask for is your ssn, absolutely disgusted and hurt. Thoughts and prayers go to the American people who fell for this trap. We’ve been played once again. 🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻
attributes.title: A disgrace for Apple

attributes.review:
Hi !! I downloaded this app thinking it would help me keep up with trumps campaign. Instead I was met with multiple notification and messages asking for my private information. It also said that trump was a horrible president. I think this is a fake app made by liberals 😡.               
                                 Sincerely Karen and chad!
😹Make America cats again😸😺😽😼😻😾😿😹
attributes.title: Horrible!!

attributes.review:
ok so first of all why are people still supporting the man that is using an app to boost his campaign. i mean great way to get through to the what 5 year olds. i mean sorry man (no i’m not) but this is getting old. this app wakes me up at five in the morning trying to sell me fandoms stuff.  like do i really need a piano and a portable cookie chopper, i don’t think so. if you want to support the man that takes away from your sleep, go right ahead (you’ll look like a stupid conservative) but go right ahead. 
peace and love, 
a fellow genzer
attributes.title: what is he even doing trying to start a campaign off of an app
